alert.note: Alert for Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 7:08PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Brewster, south central Jeff Davis and Presidio Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 708 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles southwest of Marfa, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Presidio, Marfa, Adobes, Chinati Mountains, Marfa Municipal Airport, Shafter, Ruidosa, Presidio Lely International Airport and Casa Piedra. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chinati Mountains; Davis Mountains; Marfa Plateau; Presidio Valley
